title: Cult Fanatic
contents: subtitle | Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment
property | Skills | Deception +4, Persuas ion +4, Religion +2
property | Languages | any one langu age (u sually Common)
description | Dark Devotion | The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

description | Spellcasting | The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:
description | Cantrips (at will) | light, sacred flam e, thaumaturgy
description | 1st level (4 slots) | command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
description | 2nd level (3 slots) | hold person, spiritual weapon
description | Multiattack | The fan atic makes two melee attacks.
description | Dagger | Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
